it contais variables and records. diff columns can have different modes(numeric,character,factoe etc).
**data.frame** is used to combine variables(vector and factor) into a data frame.
```{r}
x=c(1,2,3)
y=c(4,5,6)
z=c(7,8,9)
gender=c("female","male","female")
mydata=data.frame(x,y,z,gender)
mydata
dim(mydata)

```
